RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: taktik [taktik@renoise.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Renoise Scripting Tool Example
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: A XRNX tool which describes step by step and in depth how to create Renoise XRNX tools. Please have a look at the source files of this tool (manifest.xml and main.lua) for more info. Also creates a new menu 'Example Tool' in the global 'Tools' menu.
